thread.title: 100 Men Of Color Gala
thread.title_full: 100 Men Of Color Gala - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: 100 Men Of Color Gala
text:
Caption 100 Men Of Color Gala Nick Caito, Special to the Courant Nick Caito, Special to the Courant 100 Men Of Color Gala Nick Caito, Special to the Courant Nick Caito, Special to the Courant See more galleries The 100 Men of Color Gala Friday night honored 100 men from the Greater Hartford area who have become role models for the community. Included in the hundred were former Hartford mayor Thomas Milner and boxer Chad Dawson. Tribute was also paid to the late Hartford Fire Chief John Stewart Jr., a past honoree.
Nick Caito
